name: Fisher Tiger
text:
When this Character would be K.O.'d by 1 of your opponent's effects, you may trash one hand and rest one DON!! card. If you do, play up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Character with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.
On Play Rest up to 1 of your opponent's characters.

effect.text: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's characters.

When this Character would be K.O.'d by 1 of your opponent's effects, you may trash one hand and rest one DON!! card. If you do, play up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Character with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.
